rows.label: qst712102_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo? You want a review
of Fusion Combos, mo?

rows.label: qst712102_msg0002
rows.name:
A Fusion Combo is a super powerful
combination where you perform a Driver
Combo during a Blade Combo, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0003
rows.name:
And vice versa, mo! A Fusion Combo
also occurs if you perform a Blade
Combo during a Driver Combo, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0004
rows.name:
By the way, when a Fusion Combo occurs,
your Party Gauge increases and the combo
time is extended, so it's all good, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a little difficult to do, but its effect
is immense, and it can be called the ultimate
battle tactic for a Driver and Blade, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0006
rows.name:
...That's all, mo! The final
test is 10 Fusion Combos, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0007
rows.name:
You can do it against anyone
anywhere, so take your time
and challenge it, mo...

rows.label: qst712102_msg0101
rows.name:
Mo mo! Why can you do it?!
You all are too amazing, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0102
rows.name:
Mo? So you want to know what the
super dangerous mission is, mo?

rows.label: qst712102_msg0104
rows.name:
Gororo and I were too focused
on scouting, so another Driver
beat us to it, mo...

rows.label: qst712102_msg0105
rows.name: Well, Gororo is a bit of a klutz, mo...

rows.label: qst712102_msg0107
rows.name:
E-even a combat pro makes
mistakes, mo! Don't look
at me like that, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0108
rows.name:
...But, one way or another,
I'm glad I met you all, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0109
rows.name:
Just being able to become friends with
amazing Drivers and Blades like you made
the trip all the way to Iira worth it, mo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0111
rows.name:
Gororo and I are free now that our
mission is gone, so we're planning
to look around Iira a bit more, mo.

rows.label: qst712102_msg0112
rows.name:
I hope you'll get along
with me and my Blade,
Kurogane, from now on, mo
